narrative.narrative: Making its home at both of Shanghai,China's large airports, Hongqiao and Pudong, Shanghai Airlines offers 140 destinations throughout China and Asia. Their fleet consists of 73 planes, including thirty-nine 737's, seven 767's, eight 757's, four A330's and a few CRJ-200's. Their logo features a white crane on a red vertical tail fin. They are owned by China Eastern Airlines and are an affiliate of the SkyTeam alliance.
